## function_createModal
> **createModal**\<`Data`\>(`config`?): [`ModalWidget`](#modalwidget)\<`Data`\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:380

Creates a new modal widget instance.

### Type Parameters

• **Data**

### Parameters

#### config?

[`PropsConfig`](../types#propsconfig)\<[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`Data`\>\>

config of the modal, either as a store or as an object containing values or stores.

### Returns

[`ModalWidget`](#modalwidget)\<`Data`\>

a new modal widget instance

## function_getModalDefaultConfig
> **getModalDefaultConfig**(): [`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`any`\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:10

Retrieve a shallow copy of the default modal config

### Returns

[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`any`\>

the default modal config

## interface_ModalApi
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:340

Interface representing the API for a modal component.

### Type Parameters

• **Data**

The type of data associated with the modal.

### Properties

#### patch

> **patch**: (`parameters`) => `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:345

Method to change some modal properties.

Modify the parameter values, and recalculate the stores accordingly

##### Parameters

###### parameters

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`Data`\>\>

##### Returns

`void`

### Methods

#### close

> **close**(`result`?): `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:353

Closes the modal with the given result.

##### Parameters

###### result?

`any`

result of the modal, as passed in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the event passed to the
[onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler (and possibly changed by it) and resolved by the promise returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method.

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### open

> **open**(): [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`any`\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:361

Opens the modal and returns a promise that is resolved when the modal is closed.
The resolved value is the result passed to the [close](#modalapi-close) method and possibly changed by the
[onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler

##### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`any`\>

## interface_ModalBeforeCloseEvent
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:404

Type of the parameter of [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose).

### Properties

#### cancel

> **cancel**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:418

Whether to cancel the close of the modal.
It can be changed from the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler.

***

#### result

> **result**: `any`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:411

Result of the modal, which is the value passed to the [close](#modalapi-close) method
and later resolved by the promise returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method.
If needed, it can be changed from the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event handler.

## constant_modalCloseButtonClick
> `const` **modalCloseButtonClick**: *typeof* `modalCloseButtonClick`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:398

Value present in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event
and returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method, when the modal is closed by a click on the close button.

## interface_ModalContext
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:20

Represents the context for a modal component.

### Type Parameters

• **Data**

The type of data associated with the modal.

### Properties

#### api

> **api**: [`ModalApi`](#modalapi)\<`Data`\>

Defined in: [core/src/types.ts:75](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/types.ts#L75)

all the api functions to interact with the widget

***

#### directives

> **directives**: [`ModalDirectives`](#modaldirectives)

Defined in: [core/src/types.ts:71](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/types.ts#L71)

directives to be used on html elements in the template of the widget or in the slots

***

#### state

> **state**: [`ModalState`](#modalstate)\<`Data`\>

Defined in: [core/src/types.ts:88](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/types.ts#L88)

the state of the widget

## interface_ModalDirectives
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:424

Directives of the modal widget.

### Properties

#### backdropDirective

> **backdropDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:435

Directive to put on the backdrop DOM element.

***

#### backdropPortalDirective

> **backdropPortalDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:447

Portal directive to put on the backdrop DOM element.

***

#### closeButtonDirective

> **closeButtonDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:453

Directive that adds all the necessary attributes to the close button

***

#### dialogDirective

> **dialogDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:458

Directive to apply to the dialog element when using the native [HTMLDialogElement](https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/API/HTMLDialogElement)

***

#### modalDirective

> **modalDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:429

Directive to put on the modal DOM element.

***

#### modalPortalDirective

> **modalPortalDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:441

Portal directive to put on the modal DOM element.

## constant_modalOutsideClick
> `const` **modalOutsideClick**: *typeof* `modalOutsideClick`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:389

Value present in the [result](#modalbeforecloseevent-result) property of the [onBeforeClose](#modalprops-onbeforeclose) event
and returned by the [open](#modalapi-open) method, when the modal is closed by a click inside the viewport but outside the modal.

## interface_ModalProps
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:152

Interface representing the properties for a modal component.

### Type Parameters

• **Data**

The type of data that the modal will handle.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:174

Whether the modal and its backdrop (if present) should be animated when shown or hidden.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:246

Value of the aria-label attribute to put on the close button.

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### backdrop

> **backdrop**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:182

Whether a backdrop should be created behind the modal.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### backdropClass

> **backdropClass**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:254

Classes to add on the backdrop DOM element.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### backdropTransition

> **backdropTransition**: [`TransitionFn`](../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:159

The transition to use for the backdrop behind the modal (if present).

##### Default Value

`fadeTransition`

***

#### children

> **children**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:300

Body of the modal.

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:290

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### closeButton

> **closeButton**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:262

Whether to display the close button.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### closeOnOutsideClick

> **closeOnOutsideClick**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:190

Whether the modal should be closed when clicking on the viewport outside the modal.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### container

> **container**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:275

Which element should contain the modal and backdrop DOM elements.
If it is not null, the modal and backdrop DOM elements are moved to the specified container.
Otherwise, they stay where the widget is located.

##### Default Value

```ts
typeof window !== 'undefined' ? document.body : null
```

***

#### contentData

> **contentData**: `Data`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:295

Data to use in content slots

***

#### footer

> **footer**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:306

Footer of the modal.

***

#### fullscreen

> **fullscreen**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:332

Option to create a fullscreen modal, according to the bootstrap documentation.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### header

> **header**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:312

Header of the modal. The default header includes [title](#modalprops-title).

***

#### modalTransition

> **modalTransition**: [`TransitionFn`](../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:167

The transition to use for the modal.

##### Default Value

`fadeTransition`

***

#### onBeforeClose

> **onBeforeClose**: (`event`) => `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:204

Event to be triggered when the modal is about to be closed (i.e. the [close](#modalapi-close) method was called).

##### Parameters

###### event

[`ModalBeforeCloseEvent`](#modalbeforecloseevent)

event giving access to the argument given to the [close](#modalapi-close) method and allowing
to cancel the close process.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onHidden

> **onHidden**: () => `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:228

Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the modal is not visible.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onShown

> **onShown**: () => `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:239

Event to be triggered when the transition is completed and the modal is visible.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onVisibleChange

> **onVisibleChange**: (`visible`) => `void`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:217

Event to be triggered when the visible property changes.

##### Parameters

###### visible

`boolean`

new value of the visible propery

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:319

Structure of the modal.
The default structure uses [header](#modalprops-header), [children](#modalprops-children) and [footer](#modalprops-footer).

***

#### title

> **title**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:325

Title of the modal.

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:283

Whether the modal should be visible when the transition is completed.

##### Default Value

`false`

## interface_ModalState
Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:27

Represents the state of a modal component.

### Type Parameters

• **Data**

The type of the data associated with the modal.

### Properties

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:58

Value of the aria-label attribute to put on the close button.

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### backdropClass

> **backdropClass**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:66

Classes to add on the backdrop DOM element.

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### backdropHidden

> **backdropHidden**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:33

Whether the backdrop is fully hidden. This can be true either because [backdrop](#modalprops-backdrop) is false or
because [visible](#modalprops-visible-2) is false and there is no current transition.

***

#### children

> **children**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:112

Body of the modal.

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:102

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### closeButton

> **closeButton**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:74

Whether to display the close button.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### container

> **container**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:87

Which element should contain the modal and backdrop DOM elements.
If it is not null, the modal and backdrop DOM elements are moved to the specified container.
Otherwise, they stay where the widget is located.

##### Default Value

```ts
typeof window !== 'undefined' ? document.body : null
```

***

#### contentData

> **contentData**: `Data`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:107

Data to use in content slots

***

#### footer

> **footer**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:118

Footer of the modal.

***

#### fullscreen

> **fullscreen**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:144

Option to create a fullscreen modal, according to the bootstrap documentation.

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### header

> **header**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:124

Header of the modal. The default header includes [title](#modalprops-title).

***

#### hidden

> **hidden**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:39

Whether the modal is fully hidden.

***

#### modalElement

> **modalElement**: `null` \| [`HTMLElement`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/API/HTMLElement)

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:51

DOM element of the modal.

***

#### structure

> **structure**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:131

Structure of the modal.
The default structure uses [header](#modalprops-header), [children](#modalprops-children) and [footer](#modalprops-footer).

***

#### title

> **title**: [`SlotContent`](../types#slotcontent)\<[`ModalContext`](#modalcontext)\<`Data`\>\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:137

Title of the modal.

***

#### transitioning

> **transitioning**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:45

Whether there is an active transition to either display or hide the modal.

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:95

Whether the modal should be visible when the transition is completed.

##### Default Value

`false`

## type alias_ModalWidget
> **ModalWidget**\<`Data`\>: [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`Data`\>, [`ModalState`](#modalstate)\<`Data`\>, [`ModalApi`](#modalapi)\<`Data`\>, [`ModalDirectives`](#modaldirectives)\>

Defined in: svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modal.gen.ts:371

Represents a modal widget with specific data type.

### Type Parameters

• **Data**

The type of data that the modal widget will handle.

## function_openModal
> **openModal**\<`Data`\>(`options`, `context`): [`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`any`\>

Defined in: [svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modalService.ts:23](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/svelte/bootstrap/src/components/modal/modalService.ts#L23)

Opens a modal dialog with the specified options.

### Type Parameters

• **Data**

The type of data that the modal will handle.

### Parameters

#### options

[`Partial`](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/utility-types.html#partialtype)\<[`ModalProps`](#modalprops)\<`Data`\>\>

The options to configure the modal.

#### context

Optional context to pass to the modal.

##### context

[`Map`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Map)\<`any`, `any`\>

A map of context values to pass to the modal.

### Returns

[`Promise`](https://developer.mozilla.org/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/Promise)\<`any`\>

A promise that resolves when the modal is closed.

### Example

```typescript
const result = await openModal<MyDataType>({
  title: 'My Modal Title',
  content: 'This is the content of the modal.'
});
console.log(result);
```
